All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BidList
A representation class for a bid_list object in the database.
BidListController
Controller for handling HTTP request concerning BidLists.
BidListRepository
Interface that let Spring implements all basic CRUD methods for accessing the bid_list table in the database.
BidListService
Implementation of the IBidListService that gets and process information from the repositories.
CurveController
Controller for handling HTTP request concerning CurvePoints.
CurvePoint
A representation class for a curve_point object in the database.
CurvePointRepository
Interface that let Spring implements all basic CRUD methods for accessing the curve_point table in the database.
CurvePointService
Implementation of the ICurvePointService that gets and process information from the repositories.
CustomUserDetailsService
A class that implements UserDetailsService from Spring to manage custom users from our database.
HomeController
Controller for handling HTTP request for home page.
IBidListService
An Interface defining the methods needed for an implementation of a BidListService.
ICurvePointService
An Interface defining the methods needed for an implementation of a CurvePointService.
IRatingService
An Interface defining the methods needed for an implementation of a RatingService.
IRuleNameService
An Interface defining the methods needed for an implementation of a RuleNameService.
ITradeService
An Interface defining the methods needed for an implementation of a TradeService.
IUserService
An Interface defining the methods needed for an implementation of a UserService.
LoginController
Controller for handling HTTP request for login.
PcsApplication
 
Rating
A representation class for a rating object in the database.
RatingController
Controller for handling HTTP request concerning Ratings.
RatingRepository
Interface that let Spring implements all basic CRUD methods for accessing the rating table in the database.
RatingService
Implementation of the IRatingService that gets and process information from the repositories.
RuleName
A representation class for a rule_name object in the database.
RuleNameController
Controller for handling HTTP request concerning RuleNames.
RuleNameRepository
Interface that let Spring implements all basic CRUD methods for accessing the rule_name table in the database.
RuleNameService
Implementation of the IRuleNameService that gets and process information from the repositories.
SpringSecurityConfig
Configuration class for Spring Security.
Trade
A representation class for a trade object in the database.
TradeController
Controller for handling HTTP request concerning Trades.
TradeRepository
Interface that let Spring implements all basic CRUD methods for accessing the trade table in the database.
TradeService
Implementation of the ITradeService that gets and process information from the repositories.
User
A representation class for a users object in the database
UserController
Controller for handling HTTP request concerning Users.
UserRepository
Interface that let Spring implements all basic CRUD methods for accessing the users table in the database.
UserService
Implementation of the IUserService that gets and process information from the repositories.
